typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCSV
EmpInfoCSV derive(Email = concat(EmpName,'@',Dept,'.com')) ~> EmailCol
